body:
Was able to do the same with go1.6 with `CC=<stand-alone-toolchain>/bin/arm-linux-androideabi-gcc` and `CXX=<stand-alone-toolchain>/bin/arm-linux-androideabi-g++` on android ndk r10e.

It's also available on windows with `.exe` attached to them and using `make.bat` instead of .bash.
Full command with powershell was like bellow when `<stand-alone-toolchain>/bin/` was added to path environment variable.
```
$env:CC="arm-linux-androideabi-gcc.exe";$env:CXX="arm-linux-androideabi-g++.exe" ; $env:GOOS='android'; $env:GOARCH='arm'; $env:GOARM=7; $env:CGO_ENABLED=1; ./make.bat --no-clean
```
